info.title: F5 Distributed Cloud Services API for ves.io.schema.waf_signatures_changelog

get.description: API to get active Staged Signatures

401.description: Returned when operation is not authorized

403.description: Returned when there is no permission to access resource

404.description: Returned when resource is not found

409.description: Returned when operation on resource is conflicting with current value

429.description: Returned when operation has been rejected as it is happening too frequently

500.description: Returned when server encountered an error in processing API

503.description: Returned when service is unavailable temporarily

504.description: Returned when server timed out processing request

parameters.name: namespace
parameters.description:
namespace

x-example: "shared"
Fetch waf signatures changelog for the given namespace

parameters.name: vh_name
parameters.description:
vh_name

x-example: "blogging-app"
Virtual Host for current request

added_signature_ids.description:
A list of new signature ids in the release.

Example: ` ["200101852", "200103290"]`
added_signature_ids.title: Added Signatures

updated_signature_ids.description:
A list of updated signature ids in the release.

Example: ` ["200101852", "200103290"]`
updated_signature_ids.title: Updated Signatures

waf_signatures_changelogReleasedSignatur.description: Response to get the list of released signatures
waf_signatures_changelogReleasedSignatur.title: ReleasedSignaturesRes

attack_type.description:
The Signature Attack Type

Example: ` "Server Side Code Injection"`
attack_type.title: attack_type

count.description:
Number of times signature detected in traffic

Example: ` "5"`
count.title: count

matching_info.description:
Request details for the matched signature

Example: ` "Matched 16 characters on offset 22 against value'/ontransitionrun/abbc/ontransitionrun='. "`
matching_info.title: matching_info
matching_info.x-ves-example: Matched 16 characters on offset 22 against value: '/ontransitionrun/abbc/ontransitionrun='.

name.description:
Detected signature name

Example: ` "Java code injection FreeMarker - objectWrapper (URI)"`
name.title: name

waf_signatures_changelogStagedSignatures.description: Request to get the list of all staged signatures
waf_signatures_changelogStagedSignatures.title: StagedSignaturesReq

end_time.description:
Fetch staged signatures whose timestamp <= end_time
 format: unix_timestamp|rfc 3339

Example: ` "2019-09-23T12:30:11.733Z"`
end_time.title: end_time

namespace.description:
Fetch staged signatures for the given namespace

Example: ` "shared"`
namespace.title: namespace

start_time.description:
Fetch staged signatures whose timestamp >= start_time
 format: unix_timestamp|rfc 3339

Example: ` "2019-09-23T12:30:11.733Z"`
start_time.title: start_time

vh_name.description:
Virtual Host for current request

Example: ` "blogging-app"`
vh_name.title: vh_name

waf_signatures_changelogStagedSignatures.description: Response to get the list of all staged signatures
waf_signatures_changelogStagedSignatures.title: StagedSignaturesRsp
